result.markdown:
---
title: "Day 01"
date: 2021-12-01
author:
  name: https://adventofcode.com/2021/day/01
  url: https://adventofcode.com/2021/day/01
---




## Setup

Import libraries:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```
:::




Read input from file:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
input <- read_lines("../input/day01.txt") |> as.integer()
```
:::




## Part 1

Define a function to count the number of increasing values in a sequence:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
count_incr <- \(x) sum(x - lag(x) > 0, na.rm = TRUE)
```
:::




Run on input:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
count_incr(input)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1581
```


:::
:::




## Part 2

Count increases for 3-measurement windows:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
count_incr(input + lead(input) + lead(input, 2))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1618
```


:::
:::
